snippet.title: PSX Longplay [466] Magical Drop
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: SCHLAUCHI

The first game in the series, first released to arcades in 1995. It features Fool, Magician, High Priestess, Chariot, Devil, and Star as playable characters. It features a single-player mode, where the player battles each playable character before taking on World in one final encounter, as well as a two-player multiplayer mode.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
